channel.title: Readings on PHP 1560/2560: Statistical Programming with R
channel.description: Recent content in Readings on PHP 1560/2560: Statistical Programming with R

item.title: Week 00 Reading
item.description: First Class is September 12 Introduction Welcome to the class! The first step will be to watch the video below and then to go through the syllabus! Syllabus Please click on the link in the menu for the syllabus. Read through this so that you know what the class is about and then proceed to the Pre Class work for Week 01

item.title: Week 01 Reading
item.description: Required Reading Getting Started with R Read Everything and make sure you install both R and RStudio Explore RStudio Happy git with R Read through this and install Git with the instructions here.

item.title: Week 02 Reading
item.description: Required Reading Introduction to R Read whole module on tidy data. R for Data Science Read Chap 9 - 16 Optional Reading Read from the following. Most of these books are the same so you may pick 1 or 2 of them. Matloff Chap 1-5 Jones Chap 1-2 Teetor Chap 7 Rizzo Chap 1

item.title: Week 03 Reading
item.description: Optional Reading Read from the following. Most of these books are the same so you may pick 1 or 2 of them. Matloff Chap 7 Jones Chap 5

item.title: Week 04 Reading
item.description: Optional Reading Read from the following. Most of these books are the same so you may pick 1 or 2 of them. Matloff Chap 12-14 Rizzo Chap 4 Jones Chap 7-9 Teetor Chap 13

item.title: Week 04 Reading
item.description: Required Reading You Should read all of these R For Data Science: Functions Chapter Functional Programming - Advanced R Functionals Function Operators

item.title: Week 06 Reading
item.description: Optional Reading Read from the following. Most of these books are the same so you may pick 1 or 2 of them. Matloff Chap 8 Rizzo Chap 3 Jones Chap 20

item.title: Week 07 Reading
item.description: Required Reading The SQL Tutorial for Data Analysis The SQL Course

item.title: Week 08 Reading
item.description: Required Reading Text Mining with R

item.title: Week 10 Reading
item.description: Required Reading DataCamp Webscraping in R Beginners Guide to Webscraping in R Primer on Webscraping in R

item.title: Week 11 Reading
item.description: Required Reading R Packages: A Beginner’s Guide R Packages

item.title: Week 13 Reading
item.description: Required Reading Building Shiny Apps - An Interactive Tutorial How to Build a Shiny App Shiny Tutorial
